title: Dealmaster: Black Friday in July, pre-Prime Day sales, and a farewell to Star Trek: Prodigy
content:
If you're mourning the cancellation of Star Trek: Prodigy on Paramount Plus, we feel you. To soften the blow, we've dug up deals on Blu-ray and DVD copies of the show. And if you'reÂ trying to load up on deals ahead of the craziness known as Amazon Prime Day on July 11, look no further. If you're a Star Wars fan rather than a Star Trek fan, we've got you covered as well!

Star Trek: Prodigy discs and merchandise

/ars_img]
